profile.en:
The sporty field captain of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A girl of few words and almost no facial expression, Shiroko gives the impression of being frigid and emotionless. In truth, she is more devoted to the Abydos High School than anything else. If it's for the sake of revitalizing the academy, she'll do whatever it takes and sometimes propose some outlandish ideas herself.
profile.jp:
アビドス高等学校所属、スポーツが好きなアビドス対策委員会の切り込み隊長。

基本的に口数が少なく、表情の変化がほとんどないため冷たい印象もあるが、実は誰よりアビドス高等学校を大事にしていると言っても過言ではない少女。学校の復興のためには手段と方法を選ばないため、たまに無茶なアイデアを提案したりする。
profile.thai:
The sporty field captain of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A girl of few words and almost no facial expression, Shiroko gives the impression of being frigid and emotionless. In truth, she is more devoted to the Abydos High School than anything else. If it's for the sake of revitalizing the academy, she'll do whatever it takes and sometimes propose some outlandish ideas herself.
profile.ko:
The sporty field captain of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A girl of few words and almost no facial expression, Shiroko gives the impression of being frigid and emotionless. In truth, she is more devoted to the Abydos High School than anything else. If it's for the sake of revitalizing the academy, she'll do whatever it takes and sometimes propose some outlandish ideas herself.
profile.zh_tw:
阿拜多斯高中所屬，喜歡運動的阿拜多斯對策委員會的突擊隊長。

雖然給人沉默寡言且幾乎沒有表情變化的冷淡印象，但其實是個說她比任何人都珍惜阿拜多斯高中也不為過的少女。
為了復興學園會不擇手段，因此偶爾會提出令人意想不到的想法。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
喜欢运动的阿拜多斯对策委员会的行动班长。

她给人的印象是，基本上沉默寡言且几乎没有表情变化，但其实她比任何人珍惜阿拜多斯学园。
为了复兴学园而不择手段，偶尔会提出令人意想不到的想法。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
阿拜多斯高中所属，喜欢运动的阿拜多斯对策委员会的突击队长。

虽然给人沉默寡言且几乎没有表情变化的冷淡印象，但其实是个说她比任何人都珍惜阿拜多斯高中也不为过的少女。
为了复兴学园会不择手段，因此偶尔会提出令人意想不到的想法。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
喜欢运动，是阿拜多斯对策委员会的突击队长。

因为沉默寡言、面无表情，所以给人一种很冷漠的印象，但其实比任何人都热爱阿拜多斯。
为了阿拜多斯的复兴，她主张不惜一切手段，偶尔还会提出天马行空的想法。

desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.

desc.zh_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.jp: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.

As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.ko: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.
desc.zh_tw: 从星野和綾音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从星野和绫音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老师和對策委員會学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 老师带着對策委員會的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: Master Shiba is a restaurant owner near the Abydos High School, whose restaurant is known to be "Shiba Ramen". He is also the boss of Serika when working.

desc.zh_tw: 柴大將是一位在阿拜多斯校區附近經營著一個名叫“柴犬拉麵”的餐廳老闆，也是茜香打工的上司。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柴大将是一位在阿拜多斯校区附近经营着一个名叫“柴犬拉面”的餐厅老板，也是茜香打工的上司。

desc.en: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.jp: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.

desc.zh_tw: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏萊的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上芹香，就以夏莱的权限查出芹香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏莱的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上芹香，就以沙勒的权限查出芹香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。

desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.jp: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.

desc.zh_tw: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到茜香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了茜香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。

desc.zh_tw: 发现了自己被绑走的茜香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，對策委員會五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了茜香。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和對策委員會学生们。战斗后，綾音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.

desc.zh_tw: 虽然救出了茜香，但吃了一发防空导弹的茜香还是支棱不住。白子将茜香送到了医护室。綾音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.en: Shiroko straights to the plan of robbing a bank, saying that she has found out everything and in that way, they will be able to earn 100 million in just five minutes. Criminal as it is, it is denied by Ayane and Serika.

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.thai: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.ko: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.thai: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. desc.ko: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_tw: 众人决定带綾音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亞瑠跟對策委員會交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。爱露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亞瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.

desc.zh_tw: 多亏對策委員會学生们大展身手，才使得亞瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.
desc.zh_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,對策委員會学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和對策委員會学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是歌赫娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.

desc.ko: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 老师在路上遇到了綾音，綾音表示要回学校准备还款，并且已经查清了便利屋68的资料。这时無月突然出现，邀请老师带便利屋68看看，被綾音呵斥候离开。

desc.en: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在格黑娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，綾音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在歌赫娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，绫音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日步美。日步美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。對策委員會一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: Having beat back the bullies, Hifumi and the Foreclosure Task Force leave the scene before an even bigger mess happens.

desc.zh_tw: 击败小流氓的日步美和對策委員會一行人，为了被卷入更大的骚动而离开现场。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is amazed by the scale of the market. Then everyone meets Hifumi, who is being chased by some bullies at that moment, and save her for good.

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.

desc.ko: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亞瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长爱露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.

desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡视黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.thai: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.ko: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.zh_tw: 走了几小时的對策委員會与日步美筋疲力尽，野乃美因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.jp: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.

desc.zh_tw: 众人发现自己的钱财似乎流入了黑市银行，而为了证实这一点，白子再次提起了自己抢银行的计划，希望藉由找到证明文件。众人顺便把日步美卷入其中。

desc.en: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.jp: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.thai: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.ko: Aru is waiting for a loan interview at the Stygian Bank when the masked members of the Foreclosure Task Force burst in and steal all the bank's money. The Black Market Guard gives chase, and Aru admires the students' act of pure villainy.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的對策委員會学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在對策委員會一行人身后。亞瑠对對策委員會学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。阿露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。亚瑠对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在暗黑银行等着贷款审查，此时蒙面的对策委员会学生们出现在她面前把现金偷走。黑市保镳紧追在对策委员会一行人身后。爱露对对策委员会学生让自己看见的坏蛋的真面目投以充满憧憬的目光。

desc.en: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.jp: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.thai: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.ko: After waiting hours long for the loan interview, Aru eventually is rejected for a loan due to poor records and unable to mortgage any property. When arguing with the staff, Abydos breaks in.
desc.zh_tw: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，亞瑠最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，阿露最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，亚瑠最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在银行等待了数小时的资质审查后，爱露最终因记录不良、无法进行财产抵押被拒绝贷款，而正与工作人员理论时，阿拜多斯一行人闯了进来。

desc.en: The Abydos threatens the staff to hand out the records, and accidentally takes out 100-million-worth money. desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.thai: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.ko: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的對策委員會一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亞瑠和便利屋职员捡走。

name.jp: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.thai: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed
name.ko: The Bottom Line That Cannot Be Crossed

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.
desc.jp: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.

desc.zh_tw: 确认情况时，众人意外发现把近一亿日元的钞票也带了出来。茜香与野乃美想要就此使用这些钱，却遭到星野的严重反对，认为底线不可逾越。最终众人决定只带走文件。

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠突然追了上来，众人又回到了“蒙面泳装团”状态。亞瑠表达了对他们的仰慕，表示想要成为像他们那样的坏蛋。之后便利屋拿走了阿拜多斯众人抢出的一亿日元，并最终还是被告知了情况。

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.

desc.zh_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遙香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而春香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.

desc.zh_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亞瑠。對策委員會的学生没明白亞瑠的内心就指责她。结果亞瑠真的模仿坏蛋与對策委員會对立。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的爱露。对策委员会的学生没明白爱露的内心就指责她。结果爱露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.thai: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.ko: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.zh_tw: 就在便利屋和對策委員會的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。綾音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是歌赫娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.thai: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.ko: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 因为亞瑠的失语使得遙香炸掉了拉面店，就连無月也开始生气了。對策委員會赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为阿露的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为亚瑠的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连无月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为爱露的失语使得春香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.thai: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.ko: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而對策委員會学生却反驳说，其他学园的風紀委員會在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜風紀委員會针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与歌赫娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.thai: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.ko: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的對策委員會学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜風紀委員會的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遙香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，歌赫娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而春香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.thai: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.thai: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.ko: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_tw: 由于和風紀委員會的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。對策委員會决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.thai: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.ko: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.

desc.zh_tw: 老师突然将视线与遙香的对上了。遙香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

desc.zh_tw: 亚子首先为風紀委員會发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望對策委員會将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。綾音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏萊的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.

desc.zh_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而對策委員會突然受到遙香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏萊，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，風紀委員會担心夏萊这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.

desc.en: Though defeated and many are retreating, but Ako doesn't give up and launches attack again. Kayoko senses that it is not the permission that Ako had, and something is absolutely wrong.

desc.zh_tw: 尽管战败且自家队伍连连撤退，但亚子仍然没有放弃，继续向众人发起攻击。佳世子敏锐感觉到这并非亚子所拥有的调兵权限，其中必有猫腻。

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用風紀委員會一事，老实地向對策委員會道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.

Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时綾音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了歌赫娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈宣布風紀委員會全部撤离，并向對策委員會请求原谅，表示今后不再会擅自入侵。格黑娜的队伍迅速离去。

desc.en: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.

desc.zh_tw: 迟到的星野对事情懵懵懂懂，不知究竟发生了什么事。大家决定明天在教室再讨论，所有人都提早回去了。白子注意到，阳奈在走之前似乎跟老师说了些什么。老师表示之后会跟大家说的。

desc.en: Back at the club room, everyone goes over what had happened. Ayane and Serika do some digging into administrative documents and tell the group that the majority of the Abydos district's land has been transfered to the Kaiser Corporation.

desc.zh_tw: 大伙们再次到社团室集合整理情况。綾音和茜香翻找行政文档，把阿拜多斯的自治区大部分都落入凯萨之手的事告诉大家。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在校门口遇到了野乃美，询问了下柴大将的身体情况。老师表示他身体情况不错，但被野乃美猜出大概还有其他问题。野乃美提议先回教室，并表达了对老师这些天来处理事情得感激之情，希望老师能够继续与他们走下去。老师表示了肯定。

desc.en: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.

desc.zh_tw: 白子似乎在对星野进行着严肃的质问，但星野一问三不知。野乃美和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与星野有些事而已”。野乃美表示對策委員會间可没有什么好隐藏的，星野于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被白子骂了”而已。尽管如此，野乃美还是看出了其中的不真诚。

desc.en: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.

desc.zh_tw: 茜香和綾音拿到了阿拜多斯全境的土地所有权地图，表示确认了一个紧急情况。起初，包括星野在内的大多数人都认为阿拜多斯当然由学校所有，但从交易记录上来看，显然大多数土地早已由凯撒集团所有。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.

Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.ko: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_tw: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和綾音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.

There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_tw: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.

Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. desc.zh_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从阳奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.

desc.zh_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，對策委員會小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: Everyone arrives at the edge of the desert. Since the train is unable to go any further, everyone starts walking. Serika wonders why the head of the Prefect Team would be the one who told Sensei, and Ayane reviews the situation back then.

desc.zh_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围對策委員會，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.jp: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.

desc.zh_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时綾音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.zh_tw: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。星野认出了他，后者像星野问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.

desc.zh_tw: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫對策委員會。星野带着气愤的對策委員會一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被歌赫娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.en: Despite all of this, Hina still can't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".

desc.zh_tw: 尽管如此，阳奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的綾音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.

desc.zh_tw: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被綾音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".

desc.zh_tw: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余對策委員會一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.thai: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".

desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.

desc.ko: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了對策委員會一把。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“對策委員會”尚存抗争，但綾音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.

desc.zh_tw: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.jp: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在实验台上，低着头，怨恨自己的天真。他对不起對策委員會的所有人，也对不起曾经的学生会成员梦前辈。再一次地，她被大人骗了。

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.

desc.zh_tw: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.

desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亞瑠抨击對策委員會“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。爱露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.

desc.zh_tw: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥對策委員會和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.

desc.zh_tw: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西装人为了自己的实验，威胁[USERNAME]老师放弃星野。但是老师不但不放弃，还宣言一定会救出星野。

desc.en: The Black Suit says he knows quite well about Sensei. In Black Suit's eyes, Sensei is the biggest obstacle and so he doesn't and shouldn't be hostile with Sensei, but rather he should seek cooperation. Sensei asks about his identity, and Black Suit says he is a member of "Gematria". He then asks what Sensei is looking for in Kivotos, but Sensei doesn't listen. The Black Suit adds that, Sensei's behaviour is no longer justified at this time, and he asks whether Sensei even knows well about his rights. He says that Hoshino is no longer a student belonging to Abydos, and mentions about the resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服表示他很了解老师。黑服认为老师的障碍为最大，因而他不想也不应与老师敌对，相反则试图寻求合作。老师询问他的身份，黑服则表示自己是“数秘术”的人，并询问老师究竟在基沃托斯寻求着什么，老师不想岔开话题。黑服继续表示，老师的行为此刻已不具备正当性，询问老师是否明白自己的权利如何。他表示星野已经不再是阿拜多斯的学生，并提到了那封退社申请书。

desc.en: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.
desc.jp: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.

And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.
desc.zh_tw: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏萊请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于對策委員會，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏莱请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于对策委员会，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。

desc.en: The Black Suit gets the idea and disdains such troublesome procedures. Sensei then goes on criticizing the Black Suits, saying they "not only deceive those childrens, tramp their hearts, but also take advantages of their sufferings." The Black Suit doesn't deny the fact that he pursues self-interests, but that's with a clear boundary: the desertification of Abydos isn't their doings, and they are just taking advantages of this disaster.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服明白了这点，鄙夷这种麻烦的手续。老师又接着批判黑服，“不但欺骗那些孩子，践踏她们的心，还利用她们的痛苦”。黑服并不否认追求自己利益这一点，但划分了界限：阿拜多斯的沙漠化并非他们造成，他们只是利用了这一灾难。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: "Those with power exploit those without, those with knowledge exploit those without," Black Suit explains the truth about the world to Sensei. The Black Suit repeats that deal, wanting Sensei to stop interfering them. They promises they will take on half of the debt, and they can keep others at Abydos High School safe and sound. But Sensei rejects it still.

desc.zh_tw: “有权者压榨无权者，有识者压榨无知者，”黑服向老师阐述了这一世间真理。黑服重复了那个提案，让老师放弃干涉他们，由他们承担一半的债务，同时也不会影响阿拜多斯其他学生的上学。但老师拒绝了提案。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot comprehend Sensei's choice. He doubts about the ability that Sensei possesses to be enemy with them, and Sensei takes out the Adult's Card - a weapon exclusive to Sensei. But the Black Suit warns Sensei, that the more he use it, the more it will be destroyed, and it will also cost Sensei's life and time. The Black Suit reminds Sensei that he still need to do a lot of daily stuff with it, and mentions again that this has nothing to do with him in the very beginning. Yet Sensei rejects that again.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他质疑老师与他们敌对的作战能力，老师不得不掏出大人的卡片。这是独属于老师的武器，但黑服也警告称，它越是使用越会被毁灭，会消耗老师的生命与时间。黑服提到老师还需要用它做许多其他的日常事情，还提到这本就与他无关，但老师仍然拒绝。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."

desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他反问老师、质询老师。老师则表示，“对于那些孩子的痛苦，没有人愿意负责。”黑服不解，表示老师与这些孩子没有任何亲缘和血缘上的关系，只是一个正好遇见他们的外人，这些责任并非老师需要承担。老师则只是表示，“那是大人该做的事”。

desc.en: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. "The so-called adults, are the ones who are able to transform the society to one that fits well in their own ideal dream, the ones who make rules, define what's normal or not, who's ordinary or not. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。

desc.en: Sensei says that even speaking out would not make him understood. The Black Suit declares that the negotiation has broken and tells Sensei the location of Hoshino and the content of the experiment at last. The Black Suit ends with "Then you'd be just rescuing your students," contemptuously, and wishes Sensei good luck.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force welcomes Sensei. The all shouts out "Let's rescue Hoshino" loud. Sensei also says that they should "give Hoshino some lessons" and Nonomi agrees that - after all, Hoshino broke her own promise. Sensei even says that they would have lines like "Say to her 'Welcome Back' and should she say 'I Am Back'!"

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出星野吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训星野一顿”，野乃美表示同意，毕竟星野违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出星野吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训星野一顿”，野宫表示同意，毕竟星野违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。

desc.en: Sensei comes to Gehenna and hopes to have a talk with Hina, but gets intercepted by Iori. Iori says it is impossible, unless Sensei's willing to lick her feet - and Sensei does it without a second thought. Iori curses at Sensei and they happens to meet Hina. Seeing Sensei kneeling down, Hina asks Sensei to rise. For some reasons, Iori mentions about the licking stuff and Hina is in great shock immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 老师来到格黑娜，希望见到阳奈，但被伊织拦下，表示除非舔她的脚——老师二话不说直接跪舔。伊织对老师破口大骂，正好遇到阳奈。阳奈见老师跪地便让老师起来，然而伊织不知为何提到了舔脚的事，阳奈大受震撼。

desc.en: Master Shiba opens a ramen cart at the side of the road and meets the four of Problem Solver 68. Just like before, the boss gives four an extra-large bowl, except that this time, a bowl per man. After dining, Kayoko still holds concerns about the battle. Yet with a fair budget, Aru says that they must go for it - though it's still, Aru pretending to be like that.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
